turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like to place an order for a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks store would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the Dublin, Ohio location at 6510 Perimeter Drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the white chocolate mocha to have no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which type of milk would you like it made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the drink to be made with nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are there any other modifications to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. When would you like the order placed?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the order to be placed now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have placed your order at the Dublin Starbucks on Perimeter Drive. Your order will be ready for pickup shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have a nice day. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
